metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26505 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A DNS rebinding issue in ReadyMedia (formerly MiniDLNA) before 1.3.1 allowsa remote web server to exfiltrate media files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26505` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

minidlna - 1.3.0+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: minidlna package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.0+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1').
